DataElement.preferredName: Clinical And/Or Hematologic Complete Remission Occurrence Date Validation Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes the reason for the missing date that the clinical and/or hematologic complete remission occurred.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Clinical And/Or Hematologic Complete Remission Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity._Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid._Pertaining to or related to the blood and blood-forming organs._The disappearance of all signs of cancer in response to treatment.  This does not always mean the cancer has been cured._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

This does not always mean the cancer has been cured.
